metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4517 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Apache Santuario XML Security for Java before 1.5.6, when applyingTransforms, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memoryconsumption) via crafted Document Type Definitions (DTDs), related tosignatures.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4517` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml-security-java - 1.5.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml-security-java package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.6-1').
